attributes.action: This petition wants school meals for children to be free of charge.
attributes.additional_details: We want the government or parliament to do this  because it will prevent children from being hungry after Lunchtime , just because they dont have the right amount of money for a meal.
attributes.background: We would like all school meals in the United Kingdom to be free of charge as some parents may not have enough money to pay the fee-this also helps children to prevent not eating because of their balance on their account.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Free school meals for all children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732029
